title.rendered: Things to Do in the Fort Worth Stockyards during The American Rodeo

content.rendered:
Be sure to join us for RFD-TV’s The American Rodeo Fanzone in the Television during the Tailgate Party on The Cowboy Channel Lawn and tour our state-of-the-art Cowboy Channel television Studio.

You can also check out the new John Wayne: an American Experience exhibit. The exhibit is a new permanent tribute to one of the silver screen’s biggest stars, John Wayne, featuring a vast selection of The Duke’s personal effects and movie memorabilia.

The Stockyards also offers all of the shopping you need in Mule Alley, and when you get tired from shopping, be sure to sit back and relax at one of the many local restaurants serving up the best of Texas cuisine.

The Cowboy Channel is proud to call the Fort Worth Stockyards home and would love to show you around!

RELATED: THE AMERICAN Rodeo 2021 live stream, how to watch, date, time
